function updateAppointmentState() { var appointmentGR = new GlideRecord("sn_apptmnt_booking_appointment_booking"); appointmentGR.get(current.appointment); if (appointmentGR && appointmentGR.getValue("state") != "confirmed" && appointmentGR.getValue("state") != "cancelled") { if (checkSiblingTasksAccepted()) { appointmentGR.state.setValue("confirmed"); appointmentGR.update(); //Event to update the status of appointment on work order gs.eventQueue('wo.appointment.state.update', current, "confirmed", ''); } } }
function checkSiblingTasksAccepted() { var tasks = new GlideRecord("wm_task"); tasks.addQuery("parent",current.parent); tasks.query(); while(tasks.next()) { if (tasks.state == 1 || tasks.state == 10 || tasks.state == 16) // draft, pending dispatch, assigned return false; } return true; }]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-06-28 04:34:55</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>2ad64e7ad7e73200811300285e61031e</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>28</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Confirm appointment on agent acceptance</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Field Service Management" source="com.snc.work_management">b66bd6bb4722c210cd4e1ce4316d4387</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_2ad64e7ad7e73200811300285e61031e</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2018-03-26 17:44:36</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>async</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=2ad64e7ad7e73200811300285e61031e"/> </record_update>
